thread.title: 'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85
thread.title_full: 'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85

author: AP
title: 'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85
text:
'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85 Gautier was best known for his role as Hymie the Robot. Post to Facebook 'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85 Gautier was best known for his role as Hymie the Robot.  //usat.ly/2iAMO5l   Join the Nation's Conversation To   'Get Smart' actor Dick Gautier dead at 85 AP Published 7:24 p.m. ET Jan. 15, 2017 | Updated 10 minutes ago Dick Gautier, second from left, played Hymie the Robot in NBC's 'Get Smart.' (Photo: NBC via Getty Images) 
LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” Actor Dick Gautier, who gained fame playing an Elvis-like singer in the Broadway musical Bye Bye Birdie and went on to play Hymie the Robot on TV's Get Smart , has died. He was 85. 
His publicist Harlan Boll tells The Associated Press that Gautier died Friday at an assisted living facility in Los Angeles County. 
Gautier, who started out as a standup comic, was nominated for a Tony for his stage turn as Conrad Birdie. 
In addition to his popular role on Get Smart, Gautier appeared in films including Divorce, American Style , Billy Jack Goes To Washington and Fun With Dick And Jane . 
Gautier, who was also a cartoonist, worked as a voice actor for cartoons including Transformers and Smurfs . 
He is survived by three children, four grandchildren and five great-grandchildren.
